entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
